info.name: ESports Strategy Summarizer API
info.description: Complete API collection for testing the ESports Strategy Summarizer backend

request.description: Check API health and model status

body.raw:
{
  "match_data": {
    "team_a": "Team Liquid",
    "team_b": "Evil Geniuses",

    "duration": "42:15",
    "team_a_composition": "Invoker, Anti-Mage, Lion, Earthshaker, Crystal Maiden",

    "events": [
      "5:30 - Team Liquid secures first blood mid lane",

      "42:15 - Team Liquid destroys ancient"

  },
  "style": "analytical",
  "focus": "team_fights",
  "length": "medium",
  "temperature": 0.7
}

request.description: Generate analytical match summary focused on team fights

{

}

request.description: Get tactical recommendations for team improvement
Identify key turning points in the match
